name: A Mad Tea Party
description: Experience Chapter 7 of Alice's Adventures in Wonderland in a unique format: an audio book on a GBA rom! Listen to a captivating reading of the chapter, complete with engaging sound effects and background music by Lo Fidelity Cassette Tape Perplexity and the Boys. As you listen, you can also immerse yourself in the original illustrations from the classic book. Use the L or R buttons to scroll through the pictures and enhance your listening experience
